0.1.1.en: Switched to correct source for available energy capability.

0.1.2.en: Add inisghts to available energy capability

0.2.0.en: Add discovery instead of manual IP input

0.3.0.en: Add grid & solar sensors. Fix cumulative energy capabiliyt for battery. Add app/driver images and icons.

0.5.0.en: Breaking change due to capability switch for avaialble energy. Fix translations for custom measures.

0.5.2.en: Add community id, further tweaks to discovery logic

0.5.4.en: Handle batteries with two battery packs correctly

0.6.0.en: Release Candidate (POSSIBLY BREAKING CHANGE): Added battery status inc. When/And flow cards. Reworked fetching logic. Polling interval setting now moved to app settings.

0.6.1.en: Tweaks to icons. Fix Homey Pro 2016-2019. Add read-only settings to battery.

0.6.4.en: Added 3rd decimal for energy import/export. Increased fault tolerance in fetch.

0.6.5.en: Improved error handling for failing data requests.

1.0.1.en: Fix for non-working AND card. Make battery settings prettier.

1.1.0.en: Changed behavior of charge/discharge to align with homey guidelines and work better in homey energy. Power & Target Power values are now negated (-power, -targetPower). No change to discharge/charge states or anything else.

1.2.0.en: Added UI picker for Battery control mode. Added flow cards for battery control mode, and setting/clearing schedules.

1.2.1.en: Added support for manually setting battery control mode and local schedules.

1.3.0.en: Updated copy for current charge/discharge card to refer to planned charging. Added two new flow cards for charge now/discharge now.

1.4.0.en: Add support for cumulative import/export for homey energy

1.4.1.en: Minor fixes due to changing Homevolt data structure.
